yellow_headlights.onDown:
if electrics.values.ignitionLevel > 0 then electrics.values.yellowlights = ((electrics.values.yellowlights or 0) + 1)%2
gui.message("Yellow = ".. electrics.values.yellowlights, 2, "nil", "flag") end
yellow_headlights.title: Yellow lights
yellow_headlights.desc: Enables and disables the yellow lights feature
